title: More canceled shows
body: We had to cancel four shows last night due to the weather, and now we're forced to do the same for the last two shows tonight (Tuesday). All this snow is CRAZY! Sorry for the inconvenience.
author: Dan

comments.author: stevie_g
comments.body: Try to take it as a positive; I'm thinking you could really use the break after the recent madness...

comments.author: Megster
comments.body: do you know yet if you will be open tonight for the 9:15 let the right one in?

comments.author: nicole
comments.body: We should be...we'll update our website at about 6:30 tonight if we do decide to cancel. But I think the weather should be ok from here on out.

comments.author: Megster
comments.body: hooray!  kelly and i will be there... my boss and his bff are coming too!
